changeSet.author: Pion (generated)
changeSet.createView: SELECT DISTINCT rc.GROUP_NAME as AUDIT_TYPE , rc.MODIFICATION_TYPE as ACTION_TYPE, ri.USER_NAME as USER_NAME , ri.REVISION_DATE as AUDIT_DATE, CAST(rc.ENTITY_ID AS CHAR(255)) AS ID, CAST(ri.ID AS CHAR(11)) AS REV_ID FROM TB_REV_INFO ri, TB_REV_CHANGES rc WHERE ri.ID=rc.REV UNION SELECT aa.AUDIT_TYPE,aa.MODIFICATION_TYPE,aa.USER_NAME,aa.REVISION_DATE,aa.ENTITY_ID,'1' FROM TB_ACTION_AUDIT aa
